mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_messages (chatroom_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message) VALUES (#{chatRoomId}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT chat_id AS chatId, chatroom_id AS chatRoomId, sender_id AS senderId, receiver_id AS receiverId, message, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE chatroom_id = #{chatRoomId} ORDER BY timestamp ASC
